Context:
School of Continuing Education recognized with an award for art instruction.
Continuing Education spring/summer schedules are available now.
George Brown College offers evening, weekend, day, and online classes.
Courses start throughout the year.
New offerings introduced within this past year include BCIN Self-Study Manuals/Training Courses.
George Brown College is located on the traditional territory of the Mississaugas of the Credit First Nation and other Indigenous peoples.
The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
